plot: As the Russians test the Peaky Blinders, Tommy realises that he is seriously outmaneuvered. But he has an ace up his sleeve.

Recovering from his injuries with a reliance on morphine Tommy, accompanied by Arthur and John, visits the Petrovnas at their London home, where, in their underground vault Tommy's new ally Alfie Solomon values the jewels with which they plan to pay Tommy though John learns that they have more sinister plans for the Shelbys. Returning to Birmingham Tommy recruits a team of tunnellers to help him steal the jewels and informs Polly, now having an affair with Ruben, that Michael knows Father Hughes of old and is prepared to kill him. Polly is not pleased at the news.—don @ minifie-1
